SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.controller

Class TeacherGradeStatisticController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.TeacherGradeStatisticController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class TeacherGradeStatisticController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for managing teacher grade statistics in the HKUST Examination System. Provides functionality to display grade statistics in a tabular format, as well as visualizations through bar charts, pie charts, and line charts. Allows filtering of data by course, exam, and student.

      public void reset()
      Resets all filters and reloads the original data.

    • query

      public void query()
      Applies filters based on the selected course, exam, and student. Updates the charts and the table view with the filtered data.

    • loadList

    • isDuplicate

      public boolean isDuplicate(TeacherGradeStatisticController.GradeStatisticClass newGrade, List<TeacherGradeStatisticController.GradeStatisticClass> gradeStatisticList)
      Checks if a grade statistic entry is a duplicate of an existing entry.
      Parameters:
      newGrade - The new GradeStatisticClass object to check.
      gradeStatisticList - The list of existing GradeStatisticClass objects.
      Returns:
      true if the new grade is a duplicate, false otherwise.
